item.title: By: Eli Weinstock-Herman (tarwn)
item.dc:creator: Eli Weinstock-Herman (tarwn)
item.description: That's pretty cool. Have you tried tying this into source control and a build server? Having an MS Build project file should make that pretty easy. (Or maybe that was in the Out of Scope part of the presentation?)
item.content:encoded: That’s pretty cool. Have you tried tying this into source control and a build server? Having an MS Build project file should make that pretty easy. (Or maybe that was in the Out of Scope part of the presentation?)
